overview: John Leslie's Don't Make Me Beg 4 features some the final scenes shot by Leslie before his untimely passing in late 2010. The all-star cast mixes with the trademark sexuality of Leslie's lens to create a balls-to-the-wall, yet melodic, visual spectacle. All four scenes feature the top talent working in porn today. The movie begins with a roaring three-way with stunning brunette Lily Carter and nubile blonde Jessie Andrews. Next up is asslicious latina Jynx Maze, who experiences a steamy double penetration at the hands of Mick Blue and John Strong. Buxom tattooed starlet Mason Moore follows up with a strong anal scene featuring some great squirting. The movie wraps up with Jaelyn Fox in a interracial romp with Prince Yahshua ending with a gooey facial.
title: Don't Make Me Beg 4
